mcq.statement: What significant event took place at Masjid al-Qiblatayn regarding the direction of prayer?

options.a: Changed Qiblah from Makkah to Jerusalem
options.b: Changed Qiblah from Jerusalem to Makkah

mcq.one_liner: The congregation at Masjid al-Qiblatayn changed their prayer direction from **Jerusalem to Makkah** after the Prophet Muhammad (P.B.U.H) received the divine command.
